description:
Video PodCatcher Deluxe is a full-featured audio and video podcatcher designed to manage your podcast content whilst on the go.
Amongst basic playback functionality, Video PodCatcher Deluxe features a sophisticated three column layout. One contains the podcast list, another displays episodes currently available (for a selected feed) and the latter column clearly displays podcast episode descriptions. Multiple feeds are also supported within this simple design and can easily be searched while playing. The integrated podcast finder gets you going quickly.
In addition, this premium version allows downloading of episodes, resumes to the last play position on restart, and adds support for episode filters (new/old episodes). Conveniently, downloads can be accessed easily within this interface and there is a playlist option for uninterrupted back to back playback.
Please note: Video PodCatcher Deluxe will only playback media formats supported by the device! See http://www.podcatcher-deluxe.com for more information.
This software is available in English, German, French, and Spanish.
versionNote: Make all orientations work even better, improved dashboard integration, better download failure handling
